titleStmt.title: Proclamation for information of the leiges [sic] anent the securing the peace of the kingdom. Edinburgh, the tenth day of February, 1649.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Text begins: The Estates of Parliament now presently conveened in this second session of the second trienniall parliament...

Proclamation requiring those active in recent armed opposition to King Charles II (of Scotland) and the Scottish parliament to find surety and declare their acceptance of a recent proclamation enforcing the peace.
Imperfect: partly cropped at outer margin with loss of some letters of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
